cleaned_text: Energy Healing Services Energy Healing Services at Deer Lake Lodge Spa Resort is a holistic approach to healing that promotes relaxation and balance within the body and mind. Our trained practitioners use techniques such as Reiki, chakra balancing, crystal healing, and others to transfer healing energy to specific areas of the body, helping to alleviate stress, tension, and pain. This non-invasive therapy can help improve overall well-being and reduce the symptoms of a wide range of conditions. Our practitioners will work with you to create a personalized treatment plan that meets your specific needs and goals. Energy Cleanse $160 Our energy cleansing service is designed to clear negative energy and entities from a person, place, or object. Our practitioners use a combination of techniques, such as sage smudging, visualization, and the use of crystals, to clear and balance the energy in and around you. This service can help to improve overall well-being, reduce stress and anxiety, and promote a sense of calm and balance. It can also be used to clear negative energy from a specific space. Reiki 50 minutes / $160 Reiki is a form of energy healing that promotes relaxation and balance within the body and mind. Our trained practitioners use gentle touch to transfer healing energy to specific areas of the body, helping to alleviate stress and tension. This non-invasive therapy can help improve overall well-being, reduce pain, and promote a sense of calm and balance. Reiki can be used in conjunction with traditional medical treatments or as a standalone therapy.
